answers.answer: Calcium buildup in your heart?  If the heart valves are bad and there is calcium buildup on the heart valves, it would make breathing difficult with shortness of breath.  People do have good days even though they have severe calcified valves.  It the calcification is too extreme, it cannot be fixed.  If the calcification is mild, the valves can be repaired either through open heart surgery or through a catheter (this is still a new procedure). Talk to your doctor about your options.  Your age, health, and if you have diabetes would be a factor.

question: The calcium buildup makes breathing hard but some days it isn't too bad(the breathing).  Anyone have that problem?  I am wondering if there is some way that the calcium can be removed without surgery.  Any suggestions will be appreciated.
title: calcium build in heart
